tools.name: find_model_elements_by_name
tools.description:
Find model elements by name model elements of a specific type.
    
    Types can be "Class", "Interface", "Actor".

tools.description:
Query model elements of a specific type.
    
    Types can be "Class", "Interface", "Actor".
